Reviews.Title: “Location and price”

Reviews.Content: stayed half week october 2009 weeks march 2010 rate week stays cleanliness condition fine ultra luxury target price level hotel breakfasts average easily found replenish supplies breakfast morning cause stated reviewer happy return hotel future centrally located dallas

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service. Definitely recommend!”
Reviews.Author: breesong
Reviews.Content: stayed quality inn conference center evening approximately 40 people minnie sales director extremely helpful provided customer service experience exceeded expectations arrived staff site helpful location hotel lbj freeway hot breakfast disappoint inclined stay quality inn conference center ballroom meeting space friday night conference service experienced prior arrival trip am ashamed quality inn deliver hesitate bring stay definitely recommend staying quality inn conference center stay dallas
